fullText: McBurney's extraordinary solo performance is a tour de force of theatrical storytelling that puts the audience inside the mind of a dying man in the Amazon rainforest.
dtliExcerpt: McBurney's extraordinary solo performance is a tour de force of theatrical storytelling that puts the audience inside the mind of a dying man in the Amazon rainforest.
